body_html: The GPU on the p2-xlarge AMI has 12 GiB of memory, so I really don't think that I am exceeding a physical constraint on the GPU. I'm wondering if there is a TF limitation that I need to tweak to increase the available memory for the graph.
body_text: The GPU on the p2-xlarge AMI has 12 GiB of memory, so I really don't think that I am exceeding a physical constraint on the GPU.  I'm wondering if there is a TF limitation that I need to tweak to increase the available memory for the graph.
body: The GPU on the p2-xlarge AMI has 12 GiB of memory, so I really don't think that I am exceeding a physical constraint on the GPU.  I'm wondering if there is a TF limitation that I need to tweak to increase the available memory for the graph.
